resources.string: Marc Bampton 2018 Â©\nFree Software License: GPLv3

This timer is the result of many searches to find an interval timer with certain features. None of the other times had all the features I wanted or were too complex and did too much! So I decided to create my own and use it to learn a bit more about Android along the way.

If you have any features you\'d like to see, let me know via the feedback button
If you find any issues with the app, please report them at the issue tracker.
